EmailTemplate.subject: Delivery Hero Free Trial Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We are delighted to confirm your free trial with Delivery Hero as discussed on the phone today.
Once we receive your information, we will give it our undivided attention and your menu will be made available to a crowd of hungry, local people using our website, www.deliveryhero.com.au.
PLEASE SEND BACK WITHIN THE NEXT 2 DAYS: 1) DELIVERY MENU 2) BANK ACCOUNT DETAILS – BSB Number, Account Name, Account Number – Online payment orders are paid out twice a month. Cash orders will be collected by you directly from the customer.
Please also don’t forget to inform your staff to expect orders from us soon. You will also receive an email notification from us once you are online.
We will set up your account with the following conditions:
Tariff Name: Success fee for each order transmitted (excl. GST): One-time setup fee (excl. GST): No cancellation Fee, No minimum contract period 2% merchant fee for credit card orders and online payment orders.
Our invoicing cycle runs from the 1st -15th and 16th - end of the month and payments will be processed within 3 business days depending on your bank.
We also have great menu printing offers available (attached in this email).
If you print your own menus, we can also send you a $10 Delivery Hero voucher that you can integrate into your menus. It gives your customers a huge $10 discount. It also won't cost you anything, because we pay for these vouchers.
Here are some videos of satisfied restaurant owners we work with: 1) Erskineville Turkish Pide & Kebabs (NSW): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rhrqauloisc 2) Thai Style (VIC): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YxKvHJbupTw 3) Grace of India (NSW):https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=euEZKfocZqI
We also advertise nationally on TV & Foxtel: www.youtube.com/watch?v=TU_Cw15KMD8.
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at any time using the contact details below.
Thank you, and welcome to Delivery Hero!
Kind regards, {!User.Name} {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
